existing_features.title: When Panel Mode is set to "runtime", lock all control configuration/editing capabilities (i.e., prevent any layout/control property mutations such as importing a new layout, editing control attributes, deleting controls, or dragging/repositioning), while still allowing users to interact with the rendered controls to emit events and see those outputs in the UI log.
Ensure Runtime-mode interactions continue to log control outputs by reliably emitting events to the backend and refreshing the Recent Signals panel upon successful emission.

Adjust the workspace control wrapper cursor/interaction affordances so that in Runtime mode it does not suggest editability (e.g., avoid showing a drag-style cursor when dragging is disabled), while preserving correct pointer interaction with the controls themselves.

new_feature_requests.summary: When runtime mode is active, lock all button attributes (prevent editing) while still allowing button interaction and logging button outputs.

projectName: Lock control configuration in Runtime mode while still emitting and displaying button outputs
